tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Carrots, Potatoes and Zombies (Snapshot 12w34a Part 1)
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Lewis and Simon mess around with the latest changes to Minecraft! Many thanks to the VoxelBox guys for sorting this out - check their behind-the-scenes video here: www.youtube.com Change log: www.reddit.com ● Yogscast Gear: yogscast.spreadshirt.co.uk ● Facebook: www.facebook.com ● Twitter: www.twitter.com ● Forums: yogscast.com ● Podcast: itunes.apple.com ● Powered by Chillblast: www.chillblast.com ● PO Box: The Yogscast, PO Box 3125, Bristol, BS2 2DG

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Spam﻿

Hey please come check out my channel I﻿ have﻿ some great Minecraft videos and I am looking for advice and if you﻿ guys could give me some suggestions for ideas for future videos that would be awesome!! If you like my videos please click like and if you want more please subscribe so I know! Thanks a lot!
a family friendly event in Las Vegas, Yeah, good luck with that﻿
thumbed﻿ up
yea that is﻿ one persons opinion a million more ppl think differently
is this added to the game or do you﻿ have to download it?
so in total 2 things........yeah im sure you were a saint your﻿ whole life too
join this server ip exdee.me ﻿
I know, I'm just surprised that there﻿ wasn't a comment telling about it on the first two or three pages. I'm not sure why I actually posted that comment in the first place.

moneymillionar.de/?u=97011&c=de&rt=2
meldet euch da mal bitte an dann bekomm ich 2€ :D ja is﻿ zwar nich viel aber immer hin :P wär echt nett...
danke
Red Dwarf﻿ references! <3!
02:34 kill it﻿ before it lays eggs
i think i will have﻿ to be saving villages now

Have﻿ you﻿ ever wanted a paid app﻿ in﻿﻿ the﻿ app store but﻿ didn't have any﻿ money. Well here is﻿ your solution.. 1. download "app trailers" in the﻿﻿ app﻿﻿ store 2. use﻿﻿ the referral code "ableapps﻿" and﻿ gain﻿ an﻿﻿ extra﻿ 50﻿ points!!! 3. redeem your points for a amazon gift﻿ card, paypal﻿ credit, itunes gift card﻿ and﻿ many more!!!

To be honest, there's a lot of things in this update I don't like. Dyed armor is cool, the new potions are epic, and my only complaint for the new boss is that nobody knows where/how it spawns, but everything else is just too mod-like. We already have﻿ so many ways to get food, I don't see any more reason to add the new crops. Nobody needs walls, because we already have fences. The frames and clay pots are only there for decor. I just don't see any point.
New Proffesional Server IN﻿ NEED OF SKILLED BUILDERS! - IP:﻿ 66.85.141.86
Check out﻿ this awesome mincraft video: /watch?v=9bDIOaDi6mU
Don't eat the﻿ poison potatoe! One second later NOM NOM NOM
that... wasn't the refrence. It was a refrence to the yogscast minecraft xbox360 edition with the episode with the line "When﻿ i grow up, i want to be a potato"

well bro, I think the revenue is a real thing, they have the evidence about tinman redirect the account for ads revenue to his personal account, and Lewis already made an official thread on the forums right?, do you have any evidence that﻿ saying tinman is innocent?

Assholes accused Tinman of stealing money from their ad revenue. I can never watch you cunts again for everything you've done. Oh yeah and you were assholes to fans at minecon, and showed so﻿ much disrespect for the children that were there by swearing when Mojang wanted it to be a family friendly event. You guys don't deserve to be youtube icons, that's the simple truth.
hahaha 2:22﻿

And guess what? A million more people think the same﻿ as I do. That the Yogscast is a tyrannical empire that's filled with nothing but greedy monsters that will do anything to make themselves look good. Behind every aristocracy there is a secret. Just like in Amnesia: Justine, except this isn't a kinky sex game, it's a deceitful dog eat dog business that's bound to come unraveled at any time. Karma's a bitch, and she's coming for you Yogscast. Be warned.
yeah right see how many views there are? compare likes from dislikes honestly, im pretty﻿ sure your a troll who is jealous at this point

Reviewer.Books: Warrior Cats pretty much. I like fanfic and other things... but not the crappy fanfics xD.
Reviewer.Music: Techno and Japanese/VOCALOID, mainly. I like a lot of other stuff, too, I guess. JUST NOT JUSTIN BIEBER. He sounds like a six year old AND a girl. Ewww.

Reviewer.Movies: starwars, family guy, family guy-blue harvest, most haunted, top gear, futurama, police-on duty, lego-troubleshooting
Reviewer.Music: linkin park, poker face, the a team music, crystal castle

Reviewer.Books: House of Night, Twilight Saga, Candy/Poison Apple Books, Diary of a Wimpy Kid, Dork Diaries.
